NASA - Stars news

In the \"News\" section collected astronomical pictures of the day - the main thing for the day in astronomy.

Sections \"Asteroids\" and \"Photo of Mars\" will be available in future versions of the application.

Data provided by NASA Space Agency.

English is the original language of the data received.

Translation into other languages performed by Yandex Translate.

App NASA - Stars news in Play Market.
